name: Photoshoot: Amateur Photography
description:
Wander around an abandoned shopping centre and take photos to make you e-famous. I'm sure they'll turn out great, your phone is supposed to have a really good camera!

Controls:

  • Mouse/arrow keys/right stick: look
  • W/A/S/D or left stick: movement
  • Left mouse/left trigger/Q: take flash photo
  • Right mouse/right trigger/E: take photo without flash
  • Escape: quit

Credits
